title: The Augsburg Confession (The Confession of Faith: Which Was Submitted to His Imperial Majesty Charles V At the Diet of Augsburg
description: The Augsburg Confession (The Confession of Which Was Submitted to His Imperial Majesty Charles V At the Diet of Augsburg in the Year 1530) is a popular classic work written by Philip Melanchthon. This kindle digital edition of The Augsburg Confession (The Confession of Which Was Submitted to His Imperial Majesty Charles V At the Diet of Augsburg in the Year 1530) has been professionally designed and maintains the quality of the original classic publication. The Augsburg Confession (The Confession of Which Was Submitted to His Imperial Majesty Charles V At the Diet of Augsburg in the Year 1530) is highly recommended for those who enjoy the writings of Philip Melanchthon and also those discovering the works of Philip Melanchthon for the first time.
author: Philipp Melanchthon
